snippet: Senator Olympia J. Snowe’s decision to leave the Senate, announced as a divisive vote on health care coverage loomed, reflected growing unease among moderates.
abstract: Maine Senator Olympia J Snowe’s decision to leave the Senate, announced as a divisive vote on health care coverage looms, reflects growing unease among moderates with the return to a focus on social issues and with demands for party purity in the Republican electorate.
lead_paragraph: Senator Olympia J. Snowe’s decision to leave the Senate, announced as a divisive vote on health care coverage loomed, reflected growing unease among moderates.

headline.seo: Senator Olympia Snowe’s Latest Hard Choice: To Quit
headline.main: After Many Tough Choices, the Choice to Quit
headline.print_headline: After Many Tough Choices, the Choice to Quit
